name: Pop Breaker: Blast all Cubes
description:
In this unique match-2 game, tap to blast cubes of the same color to pop them out.

Solve fun puzzles and progress through the levels.

FEATURES:

● No timer, no limited move, no pressure! Play as much as you want!
● Hundreds of challenging levels
● Pop the cubes to complete the objectives
● Use powerful boosters to blast the last remaining
cubes
● Participate in the Star Tournament and compete against other players to win awesome rewards
● Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

Play for FREE! Thousands of hours of fun brain puzzles!
